name: Madieja Webfolio
title: Madieja
description: Hello! I'm Teja, currently living in Indonesia. Lazy person who love to facing problems,  thinking, and get the job done. Currently freelancing as Digital Designer and Software Engineer. Specializing in Visual Design, UI/UX Design, and Web/App Development. Would love to take any opportunities to see the world better.
author: Muhammad Teja Madiantara
